creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Dr Hashimoto, Wakayama
description: vertical calligraphy inscription down center; image of small, shallow bowl with three red strawberries below inscription
inscription: 夏に入りてまたるゝものは苺可な {Natsu ni irite / mataruru mono ha / ichigo kana}
text:
夏に入りて　
またるゝものは　
苺可な
At the beginning of summer,
Things waited for;
Strawberries.
title: Strawberries
